attributes.action: Stop the exsperamental outbrakes of man made biological weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a man of 35 im not completely blind to the running of this so called great country,there are however the unseen side of the government such as over spending on meaningless wars the pain and torture of innocent people by this government.seems strange that the government have over spent leading to a world ressetion and to top it all off you decide to release a new strane of the flu...i wonder were that came from as if we were all stupid.i know that for some numbers of years in labratories unknown to the public eye have been developing new and improved versions of illnesses such as HIV HEP A,B and C and now a new deadly version of the flu virus dont you think its about time this stopped

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
